name: Forklifts 'n Stuff
description:
Nothing more than two old pals as forklifts workin' together to get to there destination. Some folks have thrown around a lot of junk lately on this junkyard, so it's a bit harder for them to get where they want to go. Can you help them out find the right path?

Push stuff, Get to the End, don't get stuck.

Be Smart!

Made By:

- TheVoid / Sebastian Rens

Student at LUCA School of Arts
